name: Rainy Day Musing
description:
Short and simple point and click, made in an in-between time. 

My game-making pattern the past year has been to start things and run out of gas before I finish them, and start other new things part way through. There's nothing wrong with unfinished projects, but I want to share what I've been working on, and I feel like I'm ready to complete some of those games and move on from them. 

So this was a small game that I knew I could finish, and from here I'm going to start giving time and love to my unfinished stuff. I hope I get to share all of them soon. My next game will be out whenever it's ready.

 I hope you enjoy this rainy day for a minute or two.
